title: dbonnici
author: dbonnici
content: Hey guys,Let's hope this won't be the same as the guy who sold 10,000 BTC Anyways I'm selling 2222 PI coins, I hear the market price is $0.3 per coin.Give me your offers here.I accept BTC,ETH,BNB, XNO and Firo.I'm really in-need of some money now, have to sell this - otherwise i'd take my chances with it.

comments.author: bythesea
comments.body: I have seen some guy buying them on Instagram, don't remember the exact price but something like 2-3$

comments.author: zmago
comments.body: just a quick question. how long did you wait to get them to main net? i am waiting like 2 months and did all the steps.

comments.author: agoyisidro
comments.body: I have no idea on the selling ratio of pi. Can you give me your asking price?
